name: Gameplan
description:
Gameplan is an early-stage technology startup. We are excited to be backed by some of Europe's best venture capitalists and angel investors. ​

We are building a world-class Software-as-a-Service (Saas) platform to make it simple to manage, schedule, time track and communicate with large workforces and multiple suppliers. We deliver powerful analytics to our customers to help them run better businesses.

Gameplan is disrupting the billion-dollar Facilities Management space. That means our technology is changing the way that sports stadiums, entertainment venues and major attractions globally manage their operations. ​

We are passionate about building great products and we have loads of exciting new ideas in our product roadmap. Our founders have successfully built and exited businesses and we are now on the hunt to build out the next great team at Gameplan.​

team.title: CTO
team.name: Tom Nimmo
team.bioHtml: Founder of Hassle.com. Developer, engineer and web designer. Urban farmer in spare time, Tech Arch/ Dev background with Accenture. Studied at @University of Bristol

team.title: CEO
team.name: Duncan Mitchell
team.bioHtml: Co-founder and CEO of Gameplan Technology and TempTribe - workforce technologies in the hospitality and live events sector.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
Who is Gameplan?

Gameplan is an early-stage technology startup. We are excited to be backed by some of Europe’s best venture capitalists and angel investors.

We are building a world-class Software-as-a-Service (Saas) platform to make it simple to manage, schedule, time track and communicate with large workforces and multiple suppliers. We deliver powerful analytics to our customers to help them run better businesses.

Gameplan is disrupting the billion-dollar Facilities Management space. That means our technology is changing the way that sports stadiums, entertainment venues and major attractions globally manage their operations.

We are passionate about building great products and we have loads of exciting new ideas in our product roadmap. Our founders have successfully built and exited businesses and we are now on the hunt to build out the next great team at Gameplan.

We are looking for a tenacious, intelligent and hard-working Business Development Manager to start working with us as soon as possible. 

You are:

•Goal-oriented, bold and persistent with a hunger to do well
•An excellent negotiator and influencer
•A strong communicator, team player and willing to share ideas
•Inquisitive in learning about our business, our customers and the challenges they face
•Comfortable operating in a fast-paced and fluid environment
•Confident working autonomously
•Curious to learn and not afraid to make mistakes
•Research-driven with good attention to detail
•A strong communicator, team player and willing to share ideas
•Inquisitive in learning about our business, our customers and the challenges they face
•Comfortable operating in a fast-paced and fluid environment
•Confident working autonomously on briefs to deliver amazing work alongside our team
•Curious to learn and not afraid to make mistakes
 
What you will be doing:

•Identify new business opportunities – including new markets, growth areas, trends, customers, products and services
•Seek out the appropriate contact in an organisation and generate leads 
•Negotiate pricing with customers, and suppliers in some cases
•Meet with customers/clients face to face or over the phone
•Understand the needs of your customers and be able to respond effectively with a plan of how to meet these
•Work strategically – carrying out necessary planning in order to implement operational changes
•Draw up client contracts – depending on the size of company, this task may be completed by someone else or agreements may not be as formal
•Have a good understanding of the businesses’ products or services and be able to advise others about them
•Discuss promotional strategy and activities with the marketing department
•Seek ways of improving the way the business operates
•Attend seminars, conferences and events where appropriate
•Keep abreast of trends and changes in the business world
•Help to plan sales campaigns
•Create a sales pipeline
•Carry out sales forecasts and analysis and present your findings to senior management
 
What you’ll need:

•You’ll need to be a great fit for our business. We are only looking for exceptional people. That means that we don’t want to restrict our chances of finding a superstar by saying you need “2 years of this” or “experience in that.”
•You don’t need any specific experience. You just need to have a fantastic attitude, a great work ethic, a gift for winning business and be prepared to challenge yourself. The rest we’ll figure out.
 
What’s in it for you?

•Working on an exciting, rapidly evolving product
•Your work will have a big impact on the business
•Competitive salary
•Access to employee share scheme (performance-based)
•Remote working
•Skills development in fast-paced startup, you won’t get bored
•An optimistic, fun working environment

More information: https://www.gameplanteam.com/business-development/

jobs.title: Graphic Designer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a creative, intelligent and hard-working Graphic Designer to start working with us as soon as possible. Your role will be split between developing marketing material for our various platforms, as well as working with the product team developing user-centered flows and screens for our product. 

You are:

• Creative and open-minded, with good attention to detail
• Strong communicator, that seeks out coaching
• Inquisitive in learning about our business, our customers and the challenges they face
• Comfortable operating in a fast-paced, fluid and ambiguous environment
• Confident working autonomously on briefs to deliver amazing work alongside our team

What you will be doing:

• Designing images and digital graphics to develop and refine Gameplan’s brand online
• Helping us to develop physical materials for our in-person work (from banners and leaflets to giveaways)
• Producing templates and creative assets for presentations, our website, digital ads (includes social, digital, CRM, mobile and media channels), and print formats from ads and out of home media
• Assisting the Design team with user-centered interaction models, wireframes or screen mockups for out mobile and web platforms

What You’ll Need 

• 2+ years of experience in graphic design
• A degree in Design or relevant
• Proficiency in Adobe Creative Cloud, including InDesign, Illustrator, and Photoshop 
• Good understanding of typography, image, colour and layout
• Experience in brand advertising for print, digital, and social ads and campaigns
• Some experience in website creating pages and design 
• A collaborative working style, strong interpersonal skills and an ability to work well in small group settings as well as independently
• Online portfolio demonstrating relevant ability and experience
• Fluency in spoken and written English

Nice to haves:

• You’re excited about UI/UX
• Experience in wireframing or designing for mobiles and websites
• Experience in Adobe XD, Sketch, Balsamiq or other wire-framing tools
• Experience with motion design and After Effects

Benefits for you:

• A competitive salary
• The opportunity to develop new skills
• Your work will have a big impact
• Remote & flexible working
• Working in a fast-paced startup, you won't get bored
• A relaxed, supportive team culture - we aim to take our work seriously without taking ourselves too seriously

--

Important: When applying for this role, please ensure you include your CV and portfolio (or a link to your portfolio). You will only be contacted if your application is successful.
